version_description:
- DIY: Create your own slimes! Choose materials, colors and even add glitter and foam!
- Improved the user-interface design to make it even better.
- New slimes: watery, floam, glitter, and many more!

After hearing your feedback, we are proud to introduce this new app version:

- Improved slime sounds: slime audio is more realistic, with pops, squishes and other good stuff.
- Slime labels: After creating new slimes you can give them personalized names.
- Improved sharing mechanism: It's now easier than ever to share your slime creations. Squish and stretch your slime, click on the camera icon and see how your movements are turned into amazing animations!
- New user interface: We've changes the interface graphics. Your slime selection looks even better!

Oh boy, so many new goodies:
- New slimes and decorations (Add-ins): Clay, Bubbly, Crunchy, Stars & more!
- Slime Fun Area: A new place for slime games, challenges and plain fun!
- Slime Painter: Use your fingers to draw colorful paintings right on top of slime! Save to your gallery and even set as your phone's wallpaper!
- Guess the Slime Color: Test your luck! can you guess the slime color?
- Improved textures and lighting for a more realistic, colorful experience.
- New DIY slime type: Clay!
- Improved slime sounds.
- New DIY color: Due to popular demand, we've added a new orange pigment!
- Added advertisements - because we have too many bill to pay!
- Performance boost: Your slime will now move more smoothly and realistically, even on older devices.
- Improved user interface.
- Various bugfixes: including an iPhone X interface bug and many other issues.

- Colors! Colors! Colors! Due to popular demand, we've added a bunch of new colors: pink, brown, white, black and many, many more! 
- You can now share your slime image immediately after creating a new slime.
- Improved the guessing game animations.
- Fixed some bugs and improved performance.

- New slime type: Spectrum slime! Prepare to be amazed!
- New slime decorations: candy and eyes. Look out!

- New slime type: Clear!
- New fruit decorations

- New decoration: Jelly Cubes! watch them squish and stretch!
- New slime type: Milky
- Improved user interface: navigate Super Slime Simulator more easily

- Send gift slimes to your friends!!! Click on the gift icon and send your slimes. Your friends will be able to play with them on their own devices!
- You can now leave your DIY slimes uncolored
- Improved slime sound and graphics
- Various bug fixes and stability improvements

- New slime type - Jiggly
- New decoration - Ducklings
- New pastel slime colors
- Various bug fixes and stability improvements

- Muhahahaha: New spooky slime decorations!
- Cloud slime
- Color changing slime: Turn off the lights, and try it out!

- New - Glitter Slime!
- New decoration - Leaves
- Improved slime sound and graphics

- Slime My Image: New Fun Area activity! Select an image from your phone's gallery and turn it into slime
- New holiday decorations: Mistletoe and pom poms
- New colors: bottle green and deeeeep orange
- Bug fixes and stability improvements

We hope you'll enjoy our special Holiday Season release:
- Lu-Lu's Slime Quest: Help Lu-Lu save the slime kingdom by creating amazing new slimes (available in the Fun Area)
- New Snowflakes decoration
- Various improvements and bug fixes

- We've added amazing new levels to Lu-Lu's Slime Quest!
- New edible Decorations: Chocolate Beans and Gummy Bears :)
- Various improvements to the game graphics & sounds
- Fixed some annoying little bugs in iPhoneX and other devices

- Multi decorations! You can now add more than one decoration type in your slimes.
- Amazing new Lu-Lu's Slime Quest levels: Explore the legendary slime forest...!
- New slime type: Chunky slime!
- You can now share your slime paintings and Slime My Image creations.
- Various bug fixes and UI improvements
- Fixed a serious bug that caused the bottom menu to disappear on some devices :(
- Fixed an annoying bug that caused some of issues when looking at the the card album

- Crispy Jelly Slime, and it makes such a satisfying sound :)
- Stylish bowknots, sweet sweet lollipops and more decorations for you to enjoy!
- New Quest levels: Lu-Lu meets the royal family!
- Localization: We've translated the app to Portuguese and Russian.
- Minor bug fixes and improvements

- We've added the decoration so many of you asked for: Donuts! and much more...
- New Quest levels: Lu-Lu Saves the day!
- Minor bug fixes and improvements

- There are new slimes in town! Glossy! Thicc! Cream Cheese!
- Loads of new decorations: Berries, Flamingos, Bananas and many more!
- New colors (thanks for your awesome suggestions)
- Improved performance: Our app runs much faster on older devices

- Sweet Jam Slime: Mix in colors to get all kind of flavors
- New Slime Decorations: Chocolate, Cupcakes and Rainbows
- More Decoration Colors: Purple anyone?
- Coin Store: Buy coins to get more surprise packs
- New Gallery Design: Swipe left and right to navigate faster
- Fixed an annoying bugs that caused some users to experience app lockdown

- Multi decorations! You can now add more than one decoration type in your slimes.
- Amazing new Lu-Lu's Slime Quest levels: Explore the legendary slime forest...!
- New slime type: Chunky slime!
- You can now share your slime paintings and slime my image creations.
- We've fixed a serious bug that affected iPhone Pro users

- New decorations: Cereal loops and more...
- Amazing new Lu-Lu's Slime Quest levels: Welcome to the village of the slime people!
- Various bug fixes and UI improvements

- New decorations: Cereal loops and more...
- Amazing new Lu-Lu's Slime Quest levels: Welcome to the village of the slime people!
- Various bug fixes and UI improvements
This is a bug fix version that solves a slowdown in the slime gallery section for some of our users. We apologize for any inconvenience.

- Card Album! See all the Slime Types, Decorations and Colors you've won 
- Colors, colors and more colors! We've added a massive amount of colors for you to discover
- New Fun Slimes & Decorations: Gems, Rubber Bands and more!
- Surprise Packs: Open packs and get amazing awards
- We've upgraded our Slime Simulator Graphics Engine: our virtual slimes look even more realistic than before
- We've made some dramatic performance improvements.
- UI Improvements: Expand your ingredient lists while creating new slimes

- Sweet Jam Slime: Mix in colors to get all kind of flavors
- New Slime Decorations: Chocolate, Cupcakes and Rainbows
- More Decoration Colors: Purple anyone?
- Coin Store: Buy coins to get more surprise packs
- New Gallery Design: Swipe left and right to navigate faster
- Fixed an annoying bugs that caused some users to experience app lockdown

- After A LOT of user requests, we’ve added slime ingredients!!! Your new slimes are created by adding their ingredients one by one: Glue, Water, Activator and  many more!
- New Decorations: Unicorns, Kawaii Cats, Kawaii Dogs, Microbeads, Pineapples & Mermaid Tails
- New Icee Slime
- Lots of new Slime Colors (special thanks go to CC4Life16 for the great suggestions!)
- Many performance and graphic improvements

- There are new slimes in town! Glossy! Thicc! Cream Cheese!
- Loads of new decorations: Berries, Flamingos, Bananas and many more!
- New colors (thanks for your awesome suggestions)
- Improved performance: Our app runs much faster on older devices

- You can now rename your slimes! Click on the pencil icon next to the label and give your slimes a new name.
- New quest levels: Help Lu-lu escape the scorching desert!
- Lots of new slimes, decorations and colors!
- Fixed some annoying bugs (we're sorry that we turned the gray color to brown by accident!)

- Letters decoration! which 3 letter combinations will you choose to decorate your slime with? 
- New quest levels: Explore the farthest regions of slime land with Lu-Lu!
- Lots of new slimes, decorations & colors!

- New decorations and colors!
- New Quest levels: Help Lu-Lu escape the surprise invasion!
- Minor bug fixes and improvements

- We've added the decoration so many of you asked for: Donuts! and much more...
- New Quest levels: Lu-Lu Saves the day!
- Minor bug fixes and improvements

- Crispy Jelly Slime, and it makes such a satisfying sound :)
- Stylish bowknots, sweet sweet lollipops and more decorations for you to enjoy!
- New Quest levels: Lu-Lu meets the royal family!
- Localization: We've translated the app to Portuguese and Russian.
- Minor bug fixes and improvements

- Cool new decorations: Frogs, Notes and more!
- More Lu-Lu's Quest Levels
- Minor bug fixes and improvements

- Fishbowl Slime!
- Fixed an annoying bug in Lu-Lu's Quest that caused some users to get stuck
- Other interface changes

- Sequin, Bunnies and more decorations!
- Lu-Lu's quest continues
- Bug fixes & improvements

- Slushie slime!
- New decorations - Llamas, Candy Twists and more
- Lu-Lu's quest continues!
- Various bug fixes & improvements

- New decorations - Pretzels, Bats and more
- Lu-Lu's quest continues
- Bug fixes

- New decorations - Baby Dragons, Carrots and more!
- Bug fixes & interface improvements

- A brand new, shiny slime type: Mirror slime!
- Bug fixes and interface improvements

- New Milkshake Slime
- More Pastel Colors!
- Bug fixes

Enjoy this special holiday season version:
- A new and festive LAVA slime!
- Dark, starry night themed slime colors.
- Daily special offers for new slime ingredients.
- Some small bug fixes and improvements.
- Fixed an annoying bug that caused some of issues when looking at the the card album

- New decorations!
- Fixed an annoying bug that caused the app to become stuck in some situations
- Fixed another bug that caused a crash when naming your slimes

- Amazing new decorations!
- Vibrations & haptic feedback: feel your slimes like never before! (only on supported devices)

- New yummy decorations!
- Bug fixes & improvements

- Discover our improved user interface design: Enjoy the new graphics and simplified navigation!
- New decorations: Popsicles, Airplanes and more!
- Major performance improvements: we removed some annoying slowdowns to make your experience even smoother.

- New undo feature! Many of you have asked us to be able to go back during the slime creation process in case you change your minds - so we did just that :) 
- Lots of new decorations: Zebras, owls and many more.
- Various interface design improvements

- Special new decorations!
- Various interface design improvements: new sounds and animations.

- icloud backup: Your progress is stored on the iCloud Drive so your data is never lost!
- Fixed some annoying bugs

- Tired of the heat? Try out our new Snow slime!
- New fantastic decorations.
- Various interface design improvements and optimizations

- Tired of the heat? Try out our new Snow slime!
- New fantastic decorations.

- We've made many interface improvements to make it easier for you enjoy the app
